item.title: Chai Addict Takes on the Cloud
item.description: A month ago, I found myself leisurely scrolling through YouTube shorts with a cup of chai in hand (I’m addicted to chai), when suddenly, a video about a cloud challenge popped up. Despite my mixed feelings about challenges, I decided to take part in it. The challenge consisted of 15 parts. The first five were a breeze, but then the nightmare began. The initial task was to complete an AWS certificate.
